segments.text: I see a woman standing in front of the sink, her focus entirely on the plate she is drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It seems strange that she doesn't notice the water spilling over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle is forming at her feet, but she appears completely oblivious to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but wonder if she’s too lost in her own world to realize the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and it feels like this moment is filled with tension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy is dangerously perched on a wobbly stool, stretching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he tips over? It would be disastrous, especially with that water on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can hardly believe the girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost amusing to see how collaborative they are in their little heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, I feel a wave of anxiety; they are playing with fire.
segments.speaker: PAR
